code: var isModalOpen=function isModalOpen(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:false;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case"MODAL_OPEN":return state=true;case"MODAL_CLOSE":return state=false;case"SWITCH_STATE_MODAL":return!state;default:return state;}};export default isModalOpen;
